dt-api.name: column().dataSrc()
dt-api.summary: Get the data source property for the selected column.

type.description: Get the data source property for the selected column
type.returns: Data source parameter as configured by `-init columns.data`

dt-api.description:
DataTables has the ability to read data from a variety of complex data sources through use of the `-init columns.data` option. This method provides the ability to retrieve that setting after initialisation based on a column selector (see `-type column-selector`).
The value of `-init columns.data` that was set during initialisation (including the default of a column index integer) will be returned by this method, including functions (unevaluated). It is important to note that how `-init columns.render` is set has no effect on the return value of this method, which is used only for retrieving the value of `-init columns.data`.
It is not possible at this time to use this method as a setter - the data source for a column cannot be changed after initialisation.

example.title: Get the data source for a column that was clicked on
